HomePage.description: Your robust starting point for modern web applications, built with Next.js v15 App Router and the latest best practices for 2025. Accelerate your development with a pre-configured, scalable foundation.
HomePage.reason1description: Leverage Next.js v15 with the App Router, TypeScript, and modern styling conventions for a powerful and efficient development experience.
HomePage.reason2description: Built with performance in mind, ensuring fast load times and a smooth user experience right out of the box.
HomePage.reason3description: Incorporates industry-standard best practices for code quality, project structure, accessibility, and maintainability.
HomePage.reason4description: Configured with ESLint and Prettier for consistent code style, absolute imports for cleaner paths, and clear environment setup.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience building modern web applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js, with a focus on creating scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly solutions.

experience.title: Experience
experience.current: Leading development of enterprise applications with focus on performance and scalability
experience.previous: Built and maintained multiple client projects using modern web technologies
